State.Author: Roy Batty - LuthienAnarion
State.Description: Simple patcher to make Fallout New Vegas 4GB Aware. Supports all known Steam and GoG versions. The Bethesda.net and XBOX Game pass versions are NOT supported since NVSE will not support them either.
State.Name: FNV 4GB Patcher

State.Author: Roy Batty - nukem - lStewieAl - jazzisparis - LuthienAnarion - carxt
State.Description: Project to extend GECK functionality and bug fixes.
State.Name: GECK Extender

State.Author: iranrmrf
State.Description: This library will replace the in-game heap with a faster, more optimized version. It should decrease load times, remove some stutter and slightly improve frame rate.
State.Name: New Vegas Heap Replacer

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: .357 Snakeshot rounds, nice and simple.
State.Name: 357 Snakeshot Ammo

State.Author: JamesiaInc or Patchier
State.Description: Adds a second footlocker for the Brotherhood to provide a little extra equipment for their new agent, and tweaks the one given to you after Still In The Dark.
State.Name: A Better Brotherhood Bond

State.Author: JamesiaInc or Patchier
State.Description: Have you ever wondered why Major Knight only offers his special repair discount once, and it requires that you flirt with him to get it? Well, this mod aims to correct that. Now, if you're Liked or above by the NCR, Major Knight will recognize your efforts, and provide his special "discount" so long as you stay in the NCR's good graces!
State.Name: A Friend of the Outpost

State.Author: zedas
State.Description: An enhancement to the shoddy work on the vanilla functional streetlamps & lights of Outer Vegas, Camp McCarran, Camp Golf, and NCRCF.
State.Name: A Little More Lamplight

Original.Name: A Very Uncreative Collection of FPGE Mods-73699-7-4-1633923817.zip

State.Author: AVeryUncreativeUsername
State.Description: This is my collection of mods for Functional Post Game Ending.
State.Name: A Very Uncreative Collection of FPGE Mods

State.Author: MonoAccipiter - darthbdaman
State.Description: This is a continuation of the original ADAM mod, including a new installer, new meshes, modular patches and a lot of bug fixes. All neatly prepared in one download with the original author's permission.
State.Name: ADAM Reborn

State.Author: S6S and Azhidaljun and Clavyn and KorianHun
State.Description: Featuring 15 new healing items and new Survival healing options, this Aid Addon adds Antiseptic, Bandages, Blood Draw Kits, Medkits, Preserved Blood Packs, Hemostatic Pills, Combat Stims, and Army Morphine Syrettes to the wasteland, with configurable saturations per-item.
State.Name: Aid Addon - Medkits - Blood Draw - Bandages - More

State.Author: S6S and Azhidaljun and Clavyn and KorianHun
State.Description: Featuring 15 new healing items and new Survival healing options, this Aid Addon adds Antiseptic, Bandages, Blood Draw Kits, Medkits, Preserved Blood Packs, Hemostatic Pills, Combat Stims, and Army Morphine Syrettes to the wasteland, with configurable saturations per-item.
State.Name: Aid Addon - Medkits - Blood Draw - Bandages - More

State.Author: Qolore7
State.Description: Vastly improves all the weathers in the game, without stepping on the toes of vanilla New Vegas's design too much. TTW version available!
State.Name: Altitude - A Vanilla Plus Weather Mod

State.Author: c6 but uploaded by JamesiaInc
State.Description: Adds a small dialogue check (requiring 8+ Intelligence) to translate" Nihi Nove Sub Sole" when Arcade is speaking to you, resulting in being able to recruit him by showing your knowledge.
State.Name: Arcade respects your intellect

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This is a little mod that adds Attache Cases, an armor item that you drop, then open manually, to access a secondary inventory. I personally like them, because putting your pack on the ground to get stuff out of it feels immersive, and so that I can have backup chems/magazines/ammo in a disparate inventory, for simplicity in the pip boy.
State.Name: Attache Case HD - Redux

State.Author: Desmo_851 and Chinpoko117 and iSebastien and S6S
State.Description: This is a stripped down, non-replacer of the Colt Rangemaster from the illustrious Arsenal Weapon Overhaul. Features optional 2 round burst fire!
State.Name: AWO DMR Offshoot - Designated Marksman Rifle

State.Author: Xilandro - master JazzIsParis - DarianStephens
State.Description: This mod adds weapon inertia. Part of Project B42. Thanks to JazzIsMagic... I mean Paris. ;)
State.Name: B42 Weapon Inertia

State.Author: Qolore7
State.Description: Improves the character creation by speeding up the process, adding specialized gear based on your tag skills, and making Wild Wasteland an opt-in feature rather than a trait.
State.Name: Better Character Creation

State.Author: Roy Batty - Puppettron - Qolore
State.Description: Ballistic Locational Energy Explosive Damage
State.Name: BLEED

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This patch reduces the degree to which BLEED increases all creature and player limb damage multipliers
State.Name: BLEED Transfusion - BLEED Reduced Patch

State.Author: The BNW Team
State.Description: Brave New World is a project that gathers the work of professional voice actors, carefully selected to revoice Fallout: New Vegas. The mod revoices roughly 7,000 lines of vanilla dialogue and covers 145 NPCs.
State.Name: Brave New World

State.Author: AVeryUncreativeUsername
State.Description: Allows you to convince Mr. House to spare the Brotherhood of Steel.
State.Name: Brotherhood and House Truce

State.Author: AVeryUncreativeUsername
State.Description: Allows you to convince Caesar to spare the Brotherhood of Steel.
State.Name: Brotherhood and Legion Truce

State.Author: S6S and Cirosan
State.Description:
This is a slimmed down version of the Classic Perks plugin from Cirosan's Classic Overhaul﻿, from which I have cut many perks, and many of the remaining ones have been tweaked or redone. 

Intended for use with my Base Game Perks Redux﻿ and/or my Sweet 6 Shooter Perk Pack﻿.
State.Name: CCO Perks - Slimline Version

State.Author: WebbProductions2020 Sweet6Shooter and many others
State.Description: Hello folks!!! The mod that you have all waited for around a year for is finally out. With over 32 weapons added to your New Vegas game the possibilities are endless.
State.Name: Classic Fallout Weapons Remastered

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist also known as LOC or The Icon Guy
State.Description: This is a lore-friendly, mostly hand-drawn, total overhaul mod that tweaks around 3600 icons which made them immersively more consistent in terms of coloring and transparency. There are other bug fixes too, and many new details! Okay, just write that in the brief overview, it's not that hard.
State.Name: Consistent Pip-Boy Icons

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist also known as LOC or The Icon Guy
State.Description: Cleans up HUD textures (such as the compass ticks or other arrows) that have went unnoticed. The cleaning consists of removing the old noise, and sometimes i replace the old noise with a new one.
State.Name: Vanilla Hud Cleaned

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist also known as LOC or The Icon Guy
State.Description: This is a lore-friendly, mostly hand-drawn, total overhaul mod that tweaks around 3600 icons which made them immersively more consistent in terms of coloring and transparency. There are other bug fixes too, and many new details! Okay, just write that in the brief overview, it's not that hard.
State.Name: Consistent Pip-Boy Icons

State.Author: Snugglnator
State.Description: New quest that follows the investigation of a new drug empire
State.Name: Cooking in the Sand

State.Author: Joshua Lowe
State.Description:
V018.5.8 Uninstall all previous versions and use a new save before you started the mod.



The Deathsong Brotherhood is an adventure mod that adds an assassins guild to New Vegas. hours of new game play, custom meshes, textures, areas, armors, weapons, and huge underground facility.
State.Name: Deathsong Brotherhood W-I-P

State.Author: replica102
State.Description: A patch to delay the mod "Salt Lake Stories" from auto starting on load.
State.Name: Delay Salt Lake Stories

State.Author: didisaan
State.Description: Collection of my compatibility patches.
State.Name: DiDisaan's Patch Emporium

State.Author: S6S and ePath
State.Description: This mod completely overhauls Dead Money with lots of new weapons, overhauled ammo placements, starting gear changes, recipe tweaks, note tweaks, new enemies customizable reduction in collar annoyances, customizable cloud damage and cloud equipment degradation, and much more.
State.Name: DMT - Dead Money Tweaks - Complete Overhaul

State.Author: S6S and ePath
State.Description: This mod completely overhauls Dead Money with lots of new weapons, overhauled ammo placements, starting gear changes, recipe tweaks, note tweaks, new enemies customizable reduction in collar annoyances, customizable cloud damage and cloud equipment degradation, and much more.
State.Name: DMT - Dead Money Tweaks - Complete Overhaul

State.Author: S6S and ePath
State.Description: This mod completely overhauls Dead Money with lots of new weapons, overhauled ammo placements, starting gear changes, recipe tweaks, note tweaks, new enemies customizable reduction in collar annoyances, customizable cloud damage and cloud equipment degradation, and much more.
State.Name: DMT - Dead Money Tweaks - Complete Overhaul

State.Author: S6S and ePath
State.Description: This mod completely overhauls Dead Money with lots of new weapons, overhauled ammo placements, starting gear changes, recipe tweaks, note tweaks, new enemies customizable reduction in collar annoyances, customizable cloud damage and cloud equipment degradation, and much more.
State.Name: DMT - Dead Money Tweaks - Complete Overhaul

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: Completely overhauls starting gear based on tagged skills, and contextually adds bonus starting equipment based on SPECIAL stats. Provides a set of formlists that can be changed to create your own custom starting gear. Also contains an example custom gear set that includes the courier's pack DLC.
State.Name: Dynamic Starting Gear Overhaul

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: A simple, highly compatible overhaul of New Vegas's economy, aiming to make buying and selling more rewarding and plausible.
State.Name: Economy Overhaul

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: A simple, highly compatible overhaul of New Vegas's economy, aiming to make buying and selling more rewarding and plausible.
State.Name: Economy Overhaul

Original.Name: El Dorado Substation trusts an idolized Courier.zip

State.Author: JamesiaInc or Patchier
State.Description: Makes it so that being Idolized by the NCR allows you free entry to the El Dorado Substation
State.Name: El Dorado Trusts An Idolized Courier

State.Author: marioman42
State.Description: Integrates various DLC items into the game based on choices you made during the DLCs. Completely scripted and comes with a configurable ini. Requires JIP LN and JohnnyGuitar NVSE. Now with non-ending based integration version!
State.Name: Ending-Based DLC Item Integration

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This is a simple mod that adds 12/20 Ga explosive slugs.
State.Name: Explosive Shotgun Shells

State.Author: Ehamloptiran Sheson and FNVEdit Team
State.Description: An almost one click LOD generator for Fallout: New Vegas
State.Name: FNVLODGen

State.Author: Qolore7
State.Description: Changes the amount of followers for you can have to your Charisma stat/2, rounded down. Charisma is no longer a dump stat!
State.Name: Follower Formula Redone

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Assorted changes to remove annoying features from some followers. Enhanced Sensors, Spotter and Search and Mark perk effects changed. ED-Es no longer 'whir' whilst moving.
State.Name: Follower Tweaks

State.Author: ryanmar
State.Description: A number of patches I put together to make certain mods play nice with kazopert's Functional Post-Game Ending.
State.Name: FPGE Patch Collection

State.Author: JamesiaInc or Patchier
State.Description: A couple of mods that adjust rewards for The House Always Wins and Wild Card series of quests.
State.Name: A Freer...More Economic Zone of New Vegas

State.Author: JamesiaInc or Patchier
State.Description: A couple of mods that adjust rewards for The House Always Wins and Wild Card series of quests.
State.Name: A Freer...More Economic Zone of New Vegas

Original.Name: Functional Post Game Ending - FOMOD Installation-66726-5-0-1629571607.7z

State.Author: Kazopert
State.Description: Adds a fully functional post-game world to the game, no longer will you be brought to the credits and end your journey there. Instead, you will realise the consequences of what endings you've gotten and explore a vastly changed world.
State.Name: FPGE - Functional Post Game Ending

State.Author: SHAD0WC0BRA
State.Description: Makes the GRA unique weapons unavailable for purchase and scatters them across the Mojave, Zion, and the Big MT - just like all the other unique weapons.
State.Name: GRA Unique Weapons Relocated

Original.Name: Hidden Valley Overhauled Classic BoS Theme-70859-1-2-1610969183.rar

State.Author: Ludo
State.Description: Hidden Valley: Overhauled is a comprehensive, lore-friendly rework of the lighting and atmosphere of the Brotherhood of Steel's Hidden Valley Bunker that aims to better realise the potential of the location while staying true to Obsidian's vision.
State.Name: Hidden Valley Overhauled

State.Author: The Strict Nein
State.Description: Allows you to start the 'I Fought the Law' quest even if the Powder Gangers hate you
State.Name: I Fought the Law - NCR Start

State.Author: weijiesen
State.Description: Professional quality Ballistic VFX overhaul. Bullet Holes match ammo, casings match ammo, new custom particle effects impacts.
State.Name: IMPACT

State.Author: weijiesen - darthbdaman
State.Description:
Replacement main plugin for IMPACT, that automatically patches all weapons in the game, DLC, and mods, to have the appropriate Shell Casings and Impact Data Sets based on their ammo types. Work with all weapons that use vanilla or DLC ammo lists or ammo types.



Includes scripted compatibility for companion weapons and NPC ammo types.
State.Name: IMPACT - Compatibility Edition (JIP LN) (DLC - TTW - All Mods)

State.Author: Cyberlazy
State.Description: Vastly improves the LOD noise texture used on all distant land. Uses only minimal video memory and greatly improves quality.
State.Name: Improved LOD Noise Texture

Original.Name: Insignia of the Brotherhood - Hidden Valley Overhauled Metallic Monks-74057-0-2-1634587545.zip

State.Author: Spiffyskytrooper
State.Description: The Brotherhood of Steel will now proudly display a metal cast insignia on the wall of their bunker, not just a simple junk totem.
State.Name: Insignia of the Brotherhood

State.Author: yvileapsis and others
State.Description:
A collection of my mods, merged for convenience. 

Requires JIP LN NVSE and JohnnyGuitar NVSE.
State.Name: JAM - Just Assorted Mods

State.Author: jazzisparis
State.Description: This mod is designed to revolutionize the way companions are controlled and interacted with, rendering the companion-wheel obsolete and bringing new elements of team-work and tactics, with the intention of making the game look and feel more as a proper role-playing game than as an action-shooter.
State.Name: JIP Companions Command and Control

State.Author: jazzisparis
State.Description: This mod makes the crafting interface (Recipe Menu) easier, more efficient and less tedious to use.
State.Name: JIP Improved Recipe Menu

State.Author: jazzisparis
State.Description: This mod introduces a selective-fire system to Fallout: New Vegas. Most projectile-type weapons, capable of automatic fire, will have two or more optional fire-modes for the player to switch between: single/burst/auto.
State.Name: JIP Selective-Fire

State.Author: Lime
State.Description: Overhauls vanilla Fallout: New Vegas location Victor's Shack to be more useful, atmospheric and overall more interesting
State.Name: Lime's Better Victor's Shack

State.Author: Lime
State.Description: Overhauls Casino suites to be more atmospheric, useful, and more cluttered. This mod reworks the Tops presidential suite, Tops high-roller suite, the Ultra-Luxe Bon Vivant Suite & The Atomic Wrangler Corner Room. Optionally overhaul's the Lucky 38's Presidential Suite.
State.Name: Lime's Casino Suite Overhaul

Original.Name: Lime's Casino Suite Overhaul - Lucky 38 Addon-70051-1-20-1631241824.zip

State.Author: Lime
State.Description: Overhauls Casino suites to be more atmospheric, useful, and more cluttered. This mod reworks the Tops presidential suite, Tops high-roller suite, the Ultra-Luxe Bon Vivant Suite & The Atomic Wrangler Corner Room. Optionally overhaul's the Lucky 38's Presidential Suite.
State.Name: Lime's Casino Suite Overhaul

State.Author: Lime
State.Description: Reworks vanilla faction safehouses to be more atmospheric, useful & true to their associated groups. This mod completely redecorates & redesigns the NCR, Brotherhood, Legion and Followers Safehouses. Each has had it's own perks reworked and improved upon, with new commissary terminals replacing and evolving upon vanilla caretaker characters
State.Name: Lime's Faction Safehouse Overhaul

State.Author: Lime
State.Description: A vanilla styled visual overhaul for The Fort that seeks to make the area more cluttered, brutal, cultish and overall more evocative of The Legion.
State.Name: Lime's Fort Overhaul

State.Author: tomzik
State.Description: A collection of new, low poly models to use during generating LOD.
State.Name: LOD additions and improvements

State.Author: Qolore7
State.Description: Logical fixes/improvements to ownership for certain cells/items, as well as adding dynamic ownership to many cells
State.Name: Mass Ownership Tweaks

State.Author: Qolore7 - Many Others
State.Description: A compilation of many smaller gameplay mods by various authors, all fully fixed, optimized, and updated
State.Name: Misc Gameplay Merge

State.Author: Qolore7
State.Description: Various random mods I've made while playing that aren't big enough to earn their own page. Stuff will continue to be released as I find stuff to change. All in one version available!
State.Name: Miscellaneous Tweaks Collection

Original.Name: Mojave Merchants and Desert Dealers - Voiced-72624-1-30-1632768115.zip

State.Author: Lime
State.Description: Adds multiple new fully voiced vendors & service providers to the Mojave. With detailed interiors, interesting lore-friendly characters & unique services provided to the player this mod provides a new level of immersion to the dusty arid Mojave.
State.Name: Mojave Merchants and Desert Dealers

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Overhaul of New Vegas's raider factions, balancing their loot and adding more of them to fight.
State.Name: Mojave Raiders

Original.Name: Mojave Raiders - The Living Desert Patch-64660-1-02-1593164593.zip

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Overhaul of New Vegas's raider factions, balancing their loot and adding more of them to fight.
State.Name: Mojave Raiders

State.Author: PushTheWinButton
State.Description: Overhaul of New Vegas's raider factions, balancing their loot and adding more of them to fight.
State.Name: Mojave Raiders

State.Author: Dogtown1
State.Description:
IT'S BACK!



Many new creatures, some you have never seen before...
State.Name: Monster Mod

Original.Name: MoMod Lite Main File and Patches-71714-9-1637635585.rar

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This is a very heavily scrubbed version of Monster Mod that removes most non lore friendly creatures, features and weapons, and integrates the remaining creatures via script for compatibility. Creatures can be turned off by category in the ini file.
State.Name: Monster Mod Lite 2021 TTW-NV

State.Author: Oliver Swanick
State.Description:
300 lore-friendly, normalised tracks for Radio NV, nearly all those referenced in-game, and one (1) bajillion customisable features.

Feature creep done right.  You want this.
State.Name: Music Pack for Radio NV - 300 Songs.

State.Author: pwinkle
State.Description: Distributed the amazing NCR armours made by Dragbody to the trooper and ranger leveled lists.
State.Name: NCR Trooper Overhaul - Distributed

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: Cohesive, lore friendly distribution of relevant weapons from NV's DLCs into the mojave, along with GRA renaming, Mad Bomber explosive genericization, Hand Load tag removal, complete dynamic GRA -> regular weapon mod integration, and more.
State.Name: Nevada Arsenal

State.Author: Qolore7 - Dracomies
State.Description: A complete cleanup and revision of Dracomies wonderful New Vegas Redesigned 2, similar to Qwinn's Redesigned 3
State.Name: New Vegas Redesigned 2 Revised

Original.Name: NMC New Vegas Patch for ALL Sized packs-43135-1-1-1566493738.7z

State.Author: NeilMc_NMC
State.Description: Fallout New Vegas Texture pack by NeilMc_NMC: re-textures roads, trees, landscape, vehicles buildings and interiors with high-resolution photographic based equivalent textures. Global texture replacer. Does not retexture the DLC.
State.Name: NMCs_Texture_Pack_For_New_Vegas

State.Author: Panzermann11
State.Description: A collection of my personal changes for Fallout: New Vegas.
State.Name: Panzermann's Changes

Original.Name: Patchy's Preferred Preparedness Package - Scaler Moon Edition-74145-1-0-1634954974.zip

State.Author: JamesiaInc or Patchier
State.Description: Swaps out the current, barely-useful supply cache loot table with a static one.
State.Name: Standardized NCR Supply Caches

Original.Name: S6S SPECIAL Base Game Perks Redux - Patchy's Add-On-74199-1-01-1635336790.zip

State.Author: JamesiaInc or Patchier
State.Description: A small pack of additional perks and a trait or two, personally vetted by Sweet6Shooter for balance and integration with her vision!
State.Name: S6S SPECIAL Base Game Perks Redux - Patchy's Add-On

State.Author: AllYourFavorites
State.Description: A short to medium sized quest mod with a new companion, over 400 lines of voiced dialogue, a mystery to uncover, and choices to make at the end of it all.
State.Name: Peace in the Valley

State.Author: Lime
State.Description: Simple, scripted mod makes it so that NPCs will either fight or flee you if you point a gun at them. Outcome is influenced by player strength and luck.
State.Name: Point that somewhere else - NPCs react to you pointing a gun at them

State.Author: Deus Gladiorum
State.Description:
[font=Tahoma][color=#ffd966][size=5][b]Now Version 1.2.1![/b]

[/size][/color][/font]



Real Recoil is NOT just another copy of Vertical recoilmod. This is the first and only visually smooth, truly dynamic, and realistic recoil system to ever be added to Fallout: New Vegas, and it aims to bring New Vegas's gunplay into the m
State.Name: Real Recoil

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This is a version of the Real Weapon Mods 2 plugin that adds ownership to all appropriate placed weapon mods, and it also substantially reduces the total count of placed mods.
State.Name: Real Weapon Mods 2 Rebalanced

State.Author: S6S and mc_tammer and ReturnAttack
State.Description: This is a complete rebalance and addition to the ammo crafting system, built from a combo of Gunpowder-Based Ammo Crafting and Ammunition Overhaul Reloaded, with cohesive breakdown recipes, better junk ammo crafting, Hand Load and GRA tag removal, a few ammos have been added, .22/.38.44 special cases introduced, battery based EW recharging, etc.
State.Name: S6S Ammo Rebalance and Rechamber Master

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This is a user-configurable rebalance of all of the armors in NV and TTW, using scripts for compatibility. In addition, there's a full suite of fire/energy/electric resistances that can be added as well, including reductions to metallic armor rad resistance.
State.Name: S6S Armor Stats and Resistances Redux - Scripted - NV - TTW

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This is a user-configurable rebalance of all of the armors in NV and TTW, using scripts for compatibility. In addition, there's a full suite of fire/energy/electric resistances that can be added as well, including reductions to metallic armor rad resistance.
State.Name: S6S Armor Stats and Resistances Redux - Scripted - NV - TTW

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This is a user-configurable rebalance of all of the armors in NV and TTW, using scripts for compatibility. In addition, there's a full suite of fire/energy/electric resistances that can be added as well, including reductions to metallic armor rad resistance.
State.Name: S6S Armor Stats and Resistances Redux - Scripted - NV - TTW

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: Inspired by TTW Breathing Mask for the Wasteland, this mod uses a script to integrate breathing masks all over the wasteland.
State.Name: S6S Breathing Mask Integration - TTW and NV Versions

State.Author: S6S
State.Description:
This is a top to bottom overhaul of ingestible and misc items. Many have had hunger or dehydration penalties added, many effect have been changed to happen over time, values and weights have been tweaked, alcohol removes radiation, and the Food Sanitizer has been scrubbed from every single entry.

Configurable food/water healing threshold!
State.Name: S6S Ingestibles - Misc -  Food Healing requires needs - Stimpaks heal limbs at max health

Original.Name: S6S Nif Bashed Armor Patch NV Version-73352-4-2update2-1638159470.rar

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This patch slims down the integrated clothes in the Nif-Bashed Armor Pack, disabling the integration of the less than perfect armors, rebalancing most of them (with DT and DR), and making multiple completely unique with custom placements.
State.Name: S6S Nif-Bashed Armor Patch - TTW - NV

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This plugin optionally changes the handling and caliber of various NV and DLC weapons.
State.Name: S6S Scripted Weapon Tweaks

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This plugin optionally changes the handling and caliber of various NV and DLC weapons.
State.Name: S6S Scripted Weapon Tweaks

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This is a rebalance and overhaul of many base game perks, with many granting bonuses based on active SPECIAL values.
State.Name: S6S SPECIAL Base Game Perks Redux

Original.Name: S6S Spice of Life Plugin Redux-73484-3fix3-1636396530.rar

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This is a complete overhaul of the Spice of Life plugin. Nearly all new items have been renamed, given vanilla-esque Editor IDs, condition lists, custom balanced effects, new repair lists, new stats, and all integrations are done via script, for complete compatibility.
State.Name: S6S Spice of Life Replacement Plugin - Scripted - Compatibility

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This is a complete overhaul of the Spice of Life plugin. Nearly all new items have been renamed, given vanilla-esque Editor IDs, condition lists, custom balanced effects, new repair lists, new stats, and all integrations are done via script, for complete compatibility.
State.Name: S6S Spice of Life Replacement Plugin - Scripted - Compatibility

State.Author: S6S and Prodlimen
State.Description: Integrates Prodlimen's lore-friendly creatures into the game via script as enemies. TTW Versions available. INI config options available.
State.Name: S6S's Prodlimen Creature Integration Pack - NV - TTW

State.Author: Yossarian22 and Radioactivman
State.Description: This mod takes place in the area around the Great Salt Lake. On a unique designed travel map you can discover 15 mini-worldspaces, 100 interiors and 38 quests with over 50,000 voiced words of dialogue lines.
State.Name: Salt Lake Stories

State.Author: Yossarian22 and Radioactivman
State.Description: This mod takes place in the area around the Great Salt Lake. On a unique designed travel map you can discover 15 mini-worldspaces, 100 interiors and 38 quests with over 50,000 voiced words of dialogue lines.
State.Name: Salt Lake Stories

State.Author: HandsomeAwkward
State.Description: Patches the Salt Lake Stories mod to improve the dialogue options from a native English speaker's point of view.
State.Name: Salt Lake Stories - Player Dialogue Fixes

State.Author: Yossarian
State.Description: This file includes some reshaped, retextured, converted or entire new resource files, that I converted and created over the years.
State.Name: Various Meshes Resources

Original.Name: Weapons of Our Millenia and Misc Tweaks Patch-72529-1-1-1623348144.7z

State.Author: Scottmack - Camon - Qolore7
State.Description: My 10 favorite weapons made by Scottmack, all painstakingly rebalanced and adjusted from the ground in a vanilla-friendly way. Compatible with Weapons of Our Millenia.
State.Name: Scottmack's Weapons Redone

State.Author: Scottmack - Camon - Qolore7
State.Description: My 10 favorite weapons made by Scottmack, all painstakingly rebalanced and adjusted from the ground in a vanilla-friendly way. Compatible with Weapons of Our Millenia.
State.Name: Scottmack's Weapons Redone

State.Author: Mastahbossu
State.Description: Delays DLC until you meet certain requirements, no more quests and messages as soon as you step out of Doc Mitchell's house.
State.Name: Simple DLC Delay

State.Author: Voidwalker
State.Description: Dynamically generates DR for armors based on DT and class.
State.Name: Simple DTDR

State.Author: Qolore7 - MoBurma
State.Description: Modern recreation of Freeside Open, featuring many bug fixes, occlusion panes, and fixed meshes to deliver a much more stable, performance friendly, and bug free experience
State.Name: Simple Open Freeside

State.Author: Qolore7 - MoBurma
State.Description: Modern recreation of Freeside Open, featuring many bug fixes, occlusion panes, and fixed meshes to deliver a much more stable, performance friendly, and bug free experience
State.Name: Simple Open Freeside

State.Author: Qolore7 - Moburma - Schizofriendlia
State.Description: Modern recreation of Strip Open, featuring many bug fixes, occlusion panes, and fixed meshes to deliver a much more stable, performance friendly, and bug free experience
State.Name: Simple Open Strip

State.Author: The Many
State.Description: Adds two quests to help you track down the snow globes for the base game and the DLCs. Lightweight and scripted for maximum compatibility with other mods.
State.Name: Snow Globe Quests

Original.Name: Spice of Life Vanilla v1-5 Release Candidate.7z

State.Author: Nivea
State.Description:
I was always put off by the fact that 90% of the population seemed to wear the exact same armor/clothing this mod aims to try and lessen this issue by adding more clothing/armor variety.



Robert body and Breeze body and Type 3 supported.
State.Name: Spice of Life - Variety Armor and Clothing Robert Breeze Type3

Original.Name: Sweet 6 Shooter Perk Pack NV Version-73438-8fix-1638048310.rar

State.Author: S6S
State.Description:
This is a pack of 41 new perks and 10 traits, designed with TTW in mind, and any mod which re-enables the Big Guns skill.

NV Version available!

All perks are hide-able.
State.Name: Sweet 6 Shooter Perks - TTW - NV - Configurable

Original.Name: Tales of New Reno Episode One-63128-1-1595585928.rar

State.Author: Cellblock Psycho and The New Reno Team
State.Description: Get hired by a mysterious man with deep pockets who hires you to take out a New Reno Mob Boss who now has his eyes set on taking the Mojave. Will you follow through on the contract, or work for the Mob Boss yourself?
State.Name: Tales of New Reno - Episode One (Greetings from New Reno)

Original.Name: Tales of New Reno Episode Two-68380-beta0-3-1584694571.rar

State.Author: Cellblock Psycho and The New Reno Team
State.Description: You thought your dealings with the people of New Reno were over. Little did you know, they were just beginning. A infamous mercenary has stolen valuable documents from the New Reno Crime Families in order to save his own skin. In doing so, he has started a worldwide manhunt for himself. Track him down for your bosses before it's too late.
State.Name: Tales of New Reno - Episode Two (Black Napkins) WIP

Original.Name: Tales of New Reno - Episode Zero-62288-1-1589265657.rar

State.Author: Cellblock Psycho
State.Description: The town of Bonnie Springs has always had a rough history. But it has new residents. They run the town to be a friendly place, welcoming to anyone. However, places like that don't last too long, as you'll soon find out. Contains several quests, a interesting mystery, and a colorful cast of characters.
State.Name: Tales of New Reno - Episode Zero (Home on the Wastes)

State.Author: Cellblock Psycho
State.Description: Install this mod if you are interested in playing the Tales of New Reno Mods. This will carry over choices of each mod.
State.Name: Tales of New Reno Redux Choice Recorder

State.Author: JamesiaInc or Patchier
State.Description: Replaces the persuasion dialogue for Ghost Town Gunfight to be less about the "bullets and explosions" and more about the actual people of Goodsprings.
State.Name: The Courier Cares about Goodsprings

Original.Name: The Final Resting Place - A Lucky 38 Control Room Overhaul-74141-0-1-1634881454.zip

State.Author: Spiffyskytrooper
State.Description: A complete re-imagining of the Lucky 38 control room, designed to better live up to the grand and lavish personality of Mr. House.
State.Name: The Final Resting Place - A Lucky 38 Control Room Overhaul

State.Author: Lime
State.Description: An ambitious project that aims to overhaul many vanilla miscellaneous locations to be more useful, cluttered, atmospheric, unique and if applicable, lived in.
State.Name: The Great Mojave Interior Overhaul

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: Just a little mod to beef up the NCR troopers that spawn in to help retake NCRCF.
State.Name: The Law Fought Back

State.Author: JamesiaInc or Patchier
State.Description: Redoes the levelled lists for the Legion Supply Caches to be less...broken.
State.Name: The Legion Marches West - A Legion Supply Cache Overhaul

State.Author: Made by ElPascal - v1 61 kindly provided by Kazopert
State.Description: This mod adds hundreds of npcs and several scripted events to the world of Fallout: New Vegas; people patrolling the roads, traveling between towns, occupying locations, exploring the desert and reacting dynamically to your choices throughout the game. The Mojave will never feel empty again.
State.Name: The Living Desert - Travelers Patrols Consequences Increased Population and more

State.Author: Pelinor
State.Description: Allows any number of mods to be configured from a single menu.
State.Name: The Mod Configuration Menu

State.Author: Pelinor
State.Description: Allows any number of mods to be configured from a single menu.
State.Name: The Mod Configuration Menu

Original.Name: New Bison Steve Version 107 MASTER FILE VERSION-40433-107.7z

State.Author: Mike Hancho aka Balok
State.Description: Rebuild the Bison Steve Hotel and Lucky Casino from an empty structure to the Grand Opening and get a cut of the profit, two great player home options, unique weapons and armor and your own personal vendor. You'll restore law and order to a community, track down supply shipments, make a few deals along the way and watch the place transform as y
State.Name: The New Bison Steve Hotel and Lucky Casino

State.Author: JamesiaInc or Patchier
State.Description: Adds a selection of new traits and perks to compliment several playstyles.
State.Name: The Way - A Small Trait Mod

State.Author: sandbox6
State.Description:
Restores a huge amount of scenery and little random things which were patched out of the game post-release.

And because people asked for them, the fluff NPCs and creatures too.

This mod puts it all back. Well, the worthwhile stuff anyway.
State.Name: Uncut Wasteland

State.Author: Qolore7 - Macintroll
State.Description: Breathes new life and atmosphere into Vault 22, a complete remaster of Macintroll's Vault 22 Flora Overhaul
State.Name: Vault 22 Flora Overhaul Remastered

State.Author: S6S
State.Description:
This is a perk/trait pack inspired by Disco Elysium, and it's thought cabinet in particular.

It features 23 traits and 13 perks.
State.Name: Vegas Elysium Perk Pack

State.Author: Voidwalker
State.Description: A complete and total overhaul of New Vegas.
State.Name: Voidwalker's Enhancements Implemented Logically - VEIL

State.Author: Voidwalker
State.Description: A complete and total overhaul of New Vegas.
State.Name: Voidwalker's Enhancements Implemented Logically - VEIL

State.Author: Audixas
State.Description: Patches upon patches for mods that are mine and others', with various combinations thereof. If you want patches, I got 'em.
State.Name: Vanilla Flavoured Patches

State.Author: Millenia - Qolore7
State.Description: A collection of Millenia's 22 best weapons, all painstakingly rebalanced and adjusted from the ground in a vanilla-friendly way.
State.Name: Weapons of Our Millenia

State.Author: Millenia - Qolore7
State.Description: A collection of Millenia's 22 best weapons, all painstakingly rebalanced and adjusted from the ground in a vanilla-friendly way.
State.Name: Weapons of Our Millenia

State.Author: Millenia - Qolore7
State.Description: A collection of Millenia's 22 best weapons, all painstakingly rebalanced and adjusted from the ground in a vanilla-friendly way.
State.Name: Weapons of Our Millenia

State.Author: Millenia
State.Description: Adds 45 of Millenia's and MTindle's best weapons, remade to be as lore friendly and balanced as possible. All integrated into leveled lists.
State.Name: Weapons of the Modern Millenia

State.Author: Millenia
State.Description: Adds 45 of Millenia's and MTindle's best weapons, remade to be as lore friendly and balanced as possible. All integrated into leveled lists.
State.Name: Weapons of the Modern Millenia

State.Author: CarlZee
State.Description: Gives a rep system to Westside, like Goodsprings.
State.Name: Westside Reputation

State.Author: llamaRCA and Nivea
State.Description: Willow is not the usual girl companion. She is a story-driven character with over 1200 lines of voiced dialogue. She enriches your gameplay experience with her complex companion behaviors and her responses to the gameworld.
State.Name: Willow - A Better Companion Experience

State.Author: krypto5863 - LlamaRCA
State.Description: Fixes and changes for LlamaRCA's Willow plus new features.
State.Name: Willow Misc Changes

State.Author: Heaven3xx3
State.Description: An HD 2K weapon retexture pack that aims to update all of the weapon textures of NV to a new era
State.Name: WTH - Weapon Textures from Heaven

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This is a patch to change IMPACT Compatibility's behavior of adding .308 shell casings to .50MG weapons to instead use WWP Anti Material Rifle's .50 cal casing model, for any weapon that uses that ammo list.
State.Name: WWP Anti-Material Rifle IMPACT Compatibility .50 BMG Patch

State.Author: WWP Team Anonx1987 and ToastyFresh
State.Description: Replace the Anti-Materiel rifle (GRA and regular)
State.Name: WWP Anti-Materiel Rifle Replacer

Original.Name: YUP - Base Game and All DLC-51664-12-2-1622237906.7z

State.Author: Yukichigai - Currently maintained by sandbox
State.Description: A compilation of vital bug fixes for Fallout: New Vegas and its DLC, all combined into one ESM.  The only pure bug fix compilation available on the Nexus: no new features, no balance tweaks, no restored content.  Just bug fixes and nothing but bug fixes.  Available in English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, and Russian.
State.Name: Yukichigai Unofficial Patch - YUP

State.Author: zilav
State.Description: Decompresses the Fallout New Vegas BSAs and repacks them without zlib compression for performance, Also transcodes the .ogg sounds effects to .wav so they work. It also extracts any mp3 files to loose files because they will not play when in a BSA.
State.Name: FNV BSA Decompressor

State.Author: ElminsterAU and the xEdit Team
State.Description: FNVEdit is the Fallout New Vegas version of xEdit. xEdit is an advanced graphical module viewer/editor and conflict detector.
State.Name: FNVEdit

State.Author: S6S and ePath
State.Description: This mod completely overhauls Dead Money with lots of new weapons, overhauled ammo placements, starting gear changes, recipe tweaks, note tweaks, new enemies customizable reduction in collar annoyances, customizable cloud damage and cloud equipment degradation, and much more.
State.Name: DMT - Dead Money Tweaks - Complete Overhaul

State.Author: S6S and ePath
State.Description: This mod completely overhauls Dead Money with lots of new weapons, overhauled ammo placements, starting gear changes, recipe tweaks, note tweaks, new enemies customizable reduction in collar annoyances, customizable cloud damage and cloud equipment degradation, and much more.

State.Author: S6S and ePath
State.Description: This mod completely overhauls Dead Money with lots of new weapons, overhauled ammo placements, starting gear changes, recipe tweaks, note tweaks, new enemies customizable reduction in collar annoyances, customizable cloud damage and cloud equipment degradation, and much more.
State.Name: DMT - Dead Money Tweaks - Complete Overhaul

State.Author: AVeryUncreativeUsername
State.Description: Makes the Securitrons friendly after completing Wild Card: Change in Management and The House Always Wins I.
State.Name: Friendly Securitrons

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description:
Engine bugfixes, optional tweaks and new features with no performance impact. Fully customisable via in-game menu and INIs. 

Includes Inventory Searching, Cookable Grenades, Manual Reload, Smooth Aiming, WASD Menu Support and more. 

Fully compatible with TTW and The Frontier.
State.Name: lStewieAl's Tweaks

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This plugin optionally changes the handling and caliber of various NV and DLC weapons.
State.Name: S6S Scripted Weapon Tweaks

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This is just a little esp-free ScriptRunner script to rework the Tri-Beam Laser Rifle, Mutliplas Rifle, Metal Blaster, and Captain's Sidearm to act more like shotguns, and add them to the Shotgun Surgeon weapons list.
State.Name: Scatter Energy Weapons Shotgun Rework

State.Author: Qolore 7 - Anro24
State.Description: Simple scripted interior lighting overhaul. Automatically works with any mod
State.Name: Simple Interior Lighting Overhaul

Original.Name: Sweet 6 Shooter Perk Pack NV Version-73438-8-1637191685.rar

State.Author: S6S
State.Description:
This is a pack of 41 new perks and 10 traits, designed with TTW in mind, and any mod which re-enables the Big Guns skill.

NV Version available!

All perks are hide-able.
State.Name: Sweet 6 Shooter Perks - TTW - NV - Configurable

State.Author: AVeryUncreativeUsername
State.Description: Makes the Three Families allies to the player after completing their quests.
State.Name: Three Families Alliances

State.Author: jazzisparis
State.Description: An NVSE-powered plugin that is designed to manage and maintain all UI/HUD extensions added to the game by various mods. Once installed, UIO will ensure UI extensions are always properly installed and, when necessary, properly removed; it will automatically detect, resolve and prevent UI-related issues, and will help keep the game's UI intact.
State.Name: UIO - User Interface Organizer

State.Author: Qolore7
State.Description: Removes the "Compressed" flag from all records that have it, potentially providing a minor performance boost and decreased load times only at the cost of a minor increase in file size
State.Name: Decompress Records (FNVEdit Script)

State.Author: Qolore7
State.Description: Automatically patches any mods that edit Freeside with Simple Open Freeside/Freeside Open in nearly one click
State.Name: Simple Open Freeside Auto-Patcher (FNVEdit Script)

State.Author: S6S and Azhidaljun and Clavyn and KorianHun
State.Description: Featuring 15 new healing items and new Survival healing options, this Aid Addon adds Antiseptic, Bandages, Blood Draw Kits, Medkits, Preserved Blood Packs, Hemostatic Pills, Combat Stims, and Army Morphine Syrettes to the wasteland, with configurable saturations per-item.
State.Name: Aid Addon - Medkits - Blood Draw - Bandages - More

State.Author: anhatthezoo - with help from the xNVSE team
State.Description: Another script extender plugin.
State.Name: AnhNVSE

State.Author: NutnOff
State.Description: Bloodverhaul is a nice colorful/vibrant blood retexture.
State.Name: Bloodverhaul (Blood Texture)

State.Author: WebbProductions2020 Sweet6Shooter and many others
State.Description: Hello folks!!! The mod that you have all waited for around a year for is finally out. With over 32 weapons added to your New Vegas game the possibilities are endless.
State.Name: Classic Fallout Weapons Remastered

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist also known as LOC or The Icon Guy
State.Description: This is a lore-friendly, mostly hand-drawn, total overhaul mod that tweaks around 3600 icons which made them immersively more consistent in terms of coloring and transparency. There are other bug fixes too, and many new details! Okay, just write that in the brief overview, it's not that hard.
State.Name: Consistent Pip-Boy Icons

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description: Plugin to add clipboard paste support, as well as ctrl left/right and backspace/delete to aid typing in console.
State.Name: Console Paste Support

State.Author: Januusz aka Johnsonn
State.Description: Formerly 1st Person Animation Replacers, now its one of the biggest weapon animation ovehauls for FNV in terms of content, thanks to kNVSE. Featuring full animation sets for 45 weapons
State.Name: Dedicated Weapon Animations (kNVSE)

State.Author: S6S and ePath
State.Description: This mod completely overhauls Dead Money with lots of new weapons, overhauled ammo placements, starting gear changes, recipe tweaks, note tweaks, new enemies customizable reduction in collar annoyances, customizable cloud damage and cloud equipment degradation, and much more.
State.Name: DMT - Dead Money Tweaks - Complete Overhaul

State.Author: S6S and Prodlimen
State.Description: Integrates Prodlimen's lore-friendly creatures into the game via script as enemies. TTW Versions available. INI config options available.
State.Name: S6S's Prodlimen Creature Integration Pack - NV - TTW

State.Author: S6S and ePath
State.Description: This mod completely overhauls Dead Money with lots of new weapons, overhauled ammo placements, starting gear changes, recipe tweaks, note tweaks, new enemies customizable reduction in collar annoyances, customizable cloud damage and cloud equipment degradation, and much more.
State.Name: DMT - Dead Money Tweaks - Complete Overhaul

State.Author: iranrmrf
State.Description: This plugin fixes the Fallout New Vegas mod limit bug. It allows a maximum of 255 plugins to be loaded. It can also cause an increase in fps, remove game stutter and allow for faster loading times especially when using a large number of mods.
State.Name: FNV Mod Limit Fix

State.Author: Roy Batty - nukem - lStewieAl - jazzisparis - LuthienAnarion - carxt
State.Description: Project to extend GECK functionality and bug fixes.
State.Name: GECK Extender

State.Author: Hitman47101
State.Description: Full animation set for the Gatling Laser and Sprtel-Wood 9700
State.Name: Hit - Gatling Laser Anim Set - kNVSE

State.Author: Hitman47101
State.Description: Full animation set for the Laser RCW.
State.Name: Hit - Laser RCW Anim Set - kNVSE

State.Author: Hitman47101
State.Description: All my kNVSE anim sets thus far in one place.
State.Name: Hit's Anims - Season 1

State.Author: Kormakur
State.Description: xNVSE plugin that allows you to edit and save scripts in GECK and update them live into the game without needing to restart it. You can also save scripts straight from a text editor into GECK. A nice utility to have for any mod maker of Fallout New Vegas.
State.Name: Hot Reload (NVSE)

State.Author: Kormakur
State.Description: xNVSE plugin that enhances the in-game console's abilities to be able to execute and print results from ALL available script commands. Full scripting support inside console, including creating variables and evaluating NVSE expressions (arrays, strings) for easy mod development and prototyping. Mouse wheel scrolling included too.
State.Name: Improved Console (NVSE)

State.Author: jazzisparis and LuthienAnarion
State.Description:
This plugin is an extension of the New Vegas Script Extender (NVSE). It adds 900+ new functions, which can be used in GECK scripting and (in some cases) as conditions.

Additionally, this mod includes numerous engine bug fixes/tweaks, and restores several broken game features.
State.Name: JIP LN NVSE Plugin

State.Author: carxt - lStewieAl - c6
State.Description: PLAY THE GUITAR, PLAY IT AGAIN, MY JOHNNYYYYYYYYYYYY.
State.Name: JohnnyGuitar NVSE

State.Author: Kormakur
State.Description: xNVSE plugin that enables having custom animations for weapons and actors. Fixes the engine-bound anim group limit problem.
State.Name: kNVSE Animation Plugin

State.Author: Spiffyskytrooper
State.Description: Legacy Reborn aims to overhaul all landscape (and more) textures across both Fallout 3 and New Vegas, while retaining their vanilla essence.
State.Name: Legacy Reborn Texture Pack

State.Author: Mental Gear
State.Description: Hires textures and normal maps for more than 200 items or objects. Version 7.0 is ready for download.

State.Description: Hires textures and normal maps for more than 200 items or objects. Version 7.0 is ready for download.

State.Author: NeilMc_NMC
State.Description: Fallout New Vegas Texture pack by NeilMc_NMC: re-textures roads, trees, landscape, vehicles buildings and interiors with high-resolution photographic based equivalent textures. Global texture replacer. Does not retexture the DLC.
State.Name: NMCs_Texture_Pack_For_New_Vegas

State.Author: NutnOff
State.Description: A grass overhaul to all the main grasses you see in the wasteland.
State.Name: Nut's Natural Grass

State.Author: NutnOff
State.Description: A completely new and handmade retexture to the street litter alongside removing the weird 3D ones too.
State.Name: Nut's Litter Redone

State.Description: A skeleton with compatibility for the latest mods

State.Author: TheKraken
State.Description: Replaces many of "JIP Companions Command and Control"'s icons. The original icons are low resolution with weird colors and fov. These replacement icons are stylized after the perk images and blend in with the rest of the UI much better.
State.Name: Perk Styled CCC Icons

State.Author: TheKraken
State.Description: Replaces many of "JIP Companions Command and Control"'s icons. The original icons are low resolution with weird colors and fov. These replacement icons are stylized after the perk images and blend in with the rest of the UI much better.
State.Name: Perk Styled CCC Icons

State.Author: MimiArts
State.Description: Adds a new  "JIP Companions Command and Control"' icon for Willow. To match the style of Perk Styled CCC Icons.
State.Name: Perk Styled CCC Icons - Willow

State.Author: NutnOff
State.Description: A more detailed retexture of the base roads making them look more "Asphalt" like.
State.Name: Roads Redone (Road Retexture)

State.Author: S6S and mc_tammer and ReturnAttack
State.Description: This is a complete rebalance and addition to the ammo crafting system, built from a combo of Gunpowder-Based Ammo Crafting and Ammunition Overhaul Reloaded, with cohesive breakdown recipes, better junk ammo crafting, Hand Load and GRA tag removal, a few ammos have been added, .22/.38.44 special cases introduced, battery based EW recharging, etc.
State.Name: S6S Ammo Rebalance and Rechamber Master

State.Author: chadsketch
State.Description: Simple texture replacer that adds CRT lines to the monitors of Securitrons.
State.Name: Securitrons in CRT

State.Author: Millenia
State.Description: Small mod to streamline the WRP file structure and meshes to no longer require an ESP, as well as some minor bug fixes, patches, and optional extras.
State.Name: Simplified Weapon Retexture Project

Original.Name: Simplified WRP - No Repeater Peep Sight (Anniversary Anims)-73675-1-0-1631755033.7z

State.Author: Millenia
State.Description: Small mod to streamline the WRP file structure and meshes to no longer require an ESP, as well as some minor bug fixes, patches, and optional extras.
State.Name: Simplified Weapon Retexture Project

State.Author: S6S
State.Description:
This is a pack of 41 new perks and 10 traits, designed with TTW in mind, and any mod which re-enables the Big Guns skill.

NV Version available!

All perks are hide-able.
State.Name: Sweet 6 Shooter Perks - TTW - NV - Configurable

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: This is just a little esp-free ScriptRunner script to set the projectile and ammo use of the Varmint Rifle and Ratslayer to .22LR. No other changes are made. Intended for use with JSawyer or some such mod that changes the leveled lists. This is just to render the need to patch Varmint Rifle replacers with JSawyer unneeded.
State.Name: Varmint Rifle 22LR Setter

State.Author: S6S
State.Description: Just a little scriptrunner to make Cazador/Bark Scorpion/Radscorpion Poison to be named Venom.
State.Name: Venom Not Poison

State.Author: Roy Batty
State.Description: Fixes for mesh errors, uv errors, incorrect flags, missing extra data, form lists, projectiles, and other weapon related bugs and errors.
State.Name: Weapon Mesh Improvement Mod

State.Author: Heaven3xx3
State.Description: An HD 2K weapon retexture pack that aims to update all of the weapon textures of NV to a new era
State.Name: WTH - Weapon Textures from Heaven

State.Author: Kuroitsune
State.Description: High-end LOD for the Mojave Wasteland
State.Name: High Detail LOD for Mojave

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist also known as LOC or The Icon Guy
State.Description: This is a lore-friendly, mostly hand-drawn, total overhaul mod that tweaks around 3600 icons which made them immersively more consistent in terms of coloring and transparency. There are other bug fixes too, and many new details! Okay, just write that in the brief overview, it's not that hard.
State.Name: Consistent Pip-Boy Icons

State.Author: FaramH
State.Description: Adds some extra meshes for LOD generation for structures which previously didn't have them and improves some vanilla ones. Less Horrendous Nellis tower, Urban overpass walkways, rock crushing plants, cranes, barns, 3D retaining walls and some ruined buildings. WIP.
State.Name: FNV LOD Supplementation

State.Author: Ehamloptiran Sheson and FNVEdit Team
State.Description: An almost one click LOD generator for Fallout: New Vegas
State.Name: FNVLODGen

State.Author: Finnen Hawke
State.Description: Modifies the Ranger Hat (of the New California Republic Rangers) so it sits slightly lower on the head.
State.Name: Lower-sitting Ranger Hat

State.Author: Mental Gear
State.Description: Hires textures and normal maps for more than 200 items or objects. Version 7.0 is ready for download.
State.Name: MGs Neat Clutter Retextures

State.Description: Simple texture replacer that adds CRT lines to the monitors of Securitrons.

State.Author: Millenia
State.Description: Adds 45 of Millenia's and MTindle's best weapons, remade to be as lore friendly and balanced as possible. All integrated into leveled lists.
State.Name: Weapons of the Modern Millenia

State.Description: Adds 45 of Millenia's and MTindle's best weapons, remade to be as lore friendly and balanced as possible. All integrated into leveled lists.
State.Name: Weapons of the Modern Millenia

State.Author: S6S and ePath
State.Description: This mod completely overhauls Dead Money with lots of new weapons, overhauled ammo placements, starting gear changes, recipe tweaks, note tweaks, new enemies customizable reduction in collar annoyances, customizable cloud damage and cloud equipment degradation, and much more.
State.Name: DMT - Dead Money Tweaks - Complete Overhaul

State.Author: ceski
State.Description: Modifies the Pip-Boy animation to be 2x or 3x faster than default. Works with most Pip-Boy mods.
State.Name: Faster Pip-Boy Animation
